title: Buy Infosys; target of Rs 1350: ICICI Direct
description: ICICI Direct is bullish on Infosys recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1350 in its research report dated October 13, 2020.

title: Turn Brand Purpose Into A Verb To Erase Brand Culture Debt
description: It’s often said that unless you can activate your strategy, it’s not worth the paper it’s written on.

title: D-Street Buzz: IT stocks underperform - Persistent Systems, HCL Tech, Tech Mahindra, Mindtree down 3-5%
description: IT index underperformed, down over 2 percent dragged by Tech Mahindra, HCL Tech and Infosys which shed 2-3 percent followed by Tata Consultancy Services.

title: India Inc has not seen the need for R&D, says R Gopalakrishnan
description: He stresses the importance of Corporate India, investing in R&D, branding and advertising.

title: Stock market news: TCS shares drop over 2%
description: Shares of Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. traded 2.45 per cent down in trade at 12:00PM on Thursday.

title: Sensex, Nifty On Track To Break 10-Day Winning Streak
description: Nine of 11 sector gauges compiled by the National Stock Exchange were trading lower led by the Nifty IT index's 3 per cent decline.

title: TCS ouvre dix centres de gestion des menaces pour protéger ses clients des cyberattaques
description:
. octobre 2020 par Marc Jacob Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) annonce l’ouverture de 10 nouveaux centres dédiés spécifiquement à fournir des services de cybersécurité à ses clients du monde entier.

description: From Mistry attacking Tata Sons over Parliament redevelopment plan to theatres opening from today, here are top headlines this morning

title: TCS to recruit 10,000 individuals in US by 2022
description: Over the past few years, Indian IT firms have significantly increased hiring in the US and other international markets as these countries have taken steps to tighten their work visa regimes

title: Stocks in the news: Infosys, PVR, LVB, Titan, Mindtree, RBL Bank and TCS
description: Ace investor Rakesh Jhunjhunwala’s wife Rekha Jhunjhunwala sold 50,000 shares of Titan in the September quarter, according to a latest regulatory filing.

title: Infosys turns flat after hitting new high post healthy Q2 results
description: The stock surpassed its previous high of Rs 1,165.85, touched on October 13, 2020

title: Nifty IT slips over 3% on profit booking; HCL Tech, Mindtree down over 5%
description: Thus far in the financial year 2020-21, the IT index has outperformed the market by surging 74%, as compared to a 38% rise in the Sensex till Wednesday.

title: HCL Technologies Q2 preview: PAT rise seen between 10.5% - 13.6% YoY
description: Analysts at IDBI Capital forecast revenue growth of 3.9 per cent QoQ in constant currency.

title: Как в мире регулируют криптовалюту
description: Криптосфера, по мере её развития, разделилась на два больших «полушария», технологическое и финансовое: блокчейн-технологии и криптовалюты. И хотя они неразрывно связаны одной цепью, значение у них очень разное и отношение к ним тоже. Реакция государств на эт…
